casebody.data:
SOUTHWEST INVESTMENT COMPANY, INC., on behalf of itself and on behalf of First Louisiana Federal Savings Bank, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 05-5044. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Nov. 21, 2005.

Before NEWMAN, MAYER, and BRYSON, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
